attributes.action: HELPING TO SAVE BURNHOLME COMMUINITY COLLEGE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: burnholme commuinity college is a small school but very well supported by past and present pupils,teachers and the commuinity and would be a shame to see it close,this year there was a small intake as this years,year 6s were'nt that big over the next 2-3 years the numbers will go up as primary class sizes are quite large.
